description: The latest version of Polymer is fast and lean. Learn how teams at Google have successfully launched sites using Polymer and the latest platform APIs: Web Animations, Service Workers for offline and push notifications, and material design. And if you're new to Polymer we'll show you how to get started building mobile-first apps.

presenter.name: Eric Bidelman, Matthew McNulty, Taylor Savage

title: Polymer and modern web APIs: In production at Google scale
